attributes.action: Save our pubs, we are losing yet another great british institution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pubs in britain are closing at an alarming rate.  This is a place where people go to meet, to socialise, to relax.  They are closing at an alarming rate, there arent many places you can go to chill nowadays, the pub has been here for centuries, its now getting priced out of the market.  I implore the government to look into this.  We are losing our identity in this country.  We desperately need to keep this constitution going rather than remove yet another part of our identity.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Save our pubs, we are losing yet another great british institution."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20703


Prime Minister's Office
